descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffff00][size=5]Dragonslayer Eng/Rus v1.0
[/size][/color][/font][/center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][color=#1e84cc]

[/color][color=#ffff00]Author:[/color]
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

[color=#ffff00]Description:[/color]
This mod adds the Dragonslayer greatsword from Kentaro Miura's "Berserk" manga. It can be obtained at the ruins of the Peak's Shade Tower, that is East from Falkreath.

[color=#ffff00]Sword stats:[/color]
Weight: 50
Damage: base 50, crit. 20
Reach: 1,3 (standard greatsword reach)
Speed: 0,7 (standard greatsword speed)
Improvement: 5 Iron ingots, required perk - Dwarven smithing


[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3][size=3][center][size=4][size=4][size=6]***[/size][/size][/size][/center]
[size=4]
Also:[/size]

Or join me on [url=https://www.patreon.com/RonnieMagnum/overview]Patreon[/url] if you like my works![/size][/size][/font]
author: Ronnie Magnum
